name: factory-granny
description: Factory for building flexible JavaScript objects. Inspired by factory_girl.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --opts mocha.opts --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.lint: jshint --reporter=node_modules/jshint-stylish lib tests; jscs lib tests; exit 0;

author: Breno Lima de Freitas <brenolimadefreitas@gmail.com> (https://breno.io/)
